modName: Circlets Helmets for light armor - English_Italian
summary: For Light Armor bonus complete set!
descriptionHtml:
[size=15][color=red][b]LANGUAGE MOD: ENGLISH AND ITALIAN[/b][/color][/size]

[b]Changelog v1.2:[/b] [i]Increased demage protection.[/i]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]English description:[/b]
A simple helmet composed with a circlet, craftable and upgradable in the forge. You can use for get all set [i]\"complete bonus light armor\",[/i] without hide the face of your follower.

[b]Mod include 3 different circlets:

1) Protective Circlet - Ancient.
2) Protective Circlet with ruby.
3) Protective Circlet with sapphire.[/b]

Installation: Extract archive in the directory:
[b]64bit:[/b] [i]C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data[/i]
[b]32bit:[/b] [i]C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data[/i]

[b]Italian description:[/b]
Un semplice elmo composto da una tiara, forgiabile e migliorabile alla forgia. Puoi usarla per ottenere [i]il \"bonus armatura leggera completa\",[/i] senza nascondere il volto del tuo seguace.

[b]La mod include 3 tipi di tiare:

1) Tiara protettiva - Antica.
2) Tiara protettiva con rubino.
3) Tiara protettiva con zaffiro.[/b]

Installazione: Scompattate l\'archivio nella directory:
[b]64bit:[/b] [i]C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data[/i]
[b]32bit:[/b] [i]C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data[/i]
author: Chrisky
